about-description-1: Hello! I'm Sofía Barreiro, a Computer Engineer, and I have been working as a web and mobile frontend developer for over five years.
about-description-2: I have worked in many projects using Javascript frameworks such as:
about-description-2-tech: React, React Native, Vue, Angular and Node.
about-description-3: I'm passionate about everything related to web and mobile development, UX, and Product Management.
upwork-description: Development of new functionalities for the "Catalog" section using Vue and Nuxt frameworks.
godaddy-description: Development of new functionalities and maintenance of section "My Products" using React and Next frameworks.
bixlabs-description: Frontend and fullstack development for nine proyects using React, React Native, Angular and Node frameworks mainly.
wp-description: Design, development and deployment of four websites for Uruguayan and Brazilian clients.
engineering-uni-udelar: Facultad de Ingeniería UdelaR (School of Engineering, University of the Republic, Uruguay)
description-english: I attented a bilingual school and passed Cambridge's FCE and CAE exams.
